title: Diamond Vanki Necklace - A Timeless Treasure
materials: G Color). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisitely crafted Vanki necklace showcases a delicate floral and paisley design, meticulously set with sparkling diamonds. The intricate openwork design creates a light and airy feel, making it both elegant and comfortable to wear. The design is a modern take on the classic Vanki armlet, now adapted as a stunning necklace.
colors: Rose Gold and Brilliant White Diamonds.
occasions: and upscale social gatherings. A stunning statement piece for the modern bride or any woman who appreciates timeless elegance.
description: A unique blend of traditional South Indian design with a contemporary aesthetic. The brilliant diamonds and rose gold create a captivating sparkle that is sure to turn heads. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting beauty and durability. This Vanki necklace is a treasured heirloom piece that can be passed down for generations.
